answers.answer: Ive felt pelvic bone pain for about 6 months, had period like cramping all weekend after the doctor swept my membranes on friday, but no labor yet. I have a feeling shes going to incude me Monday instead of waiting until the due date as i have high BP.
Yeah im hoping i get induce due to my past experience with preeclampsia

question: Hi Everyone!. I'm 36 exactly and I'm having period like feelings and, I'm also experiencing pain down below when I start walking or laying in bed it's so bad that I hate to move at all. Has anyone felt this way? PS: This being going on for 2months now.
title: Constant Pains.
